GitTreeWalkCallback = proc (root: cstring; entry: ptr git_tree_entry; payload: pointer): cint
GitBranchType = enum
  gbtLocal = (1, "local"), gbtRemote = (2, "remote"), gbtAll = (3, "all")

  gtwPre = (0, "pre"), gtwPost = (1, "post")

  grsNone = (0, "none"), grsMerge = (1, "merge"), grsRevert = (2, "revert"),
  grsRevertSequence = (3, "revert sequence"), grsCherrypick = (4, "cherrypick"),
  grsCherrypickSequence = (5, "cherrypick sequence"), grsBisect = (6, "bisect"),

  grsRebaseMerge = (9, "rebase merge"), grsApplyMailbox = (10, "apply mailbox"),
  grsApplyMailboxOrRebase = (11, "apply mailbox or rebase")

  gpsNoMatchError = (8, "no match error"), gpsFindFailures = (16, "find failures"),

  ssIndexAndWorkdir = (0, "index and workdir"), ssIndexOnly = (1, "index only"),
  ssWorkdirOnly = (2, "workdir only")

  gsoIncludeUntracked = (1, "include untracked"),
  gsoIncludeIgnored = (2, "include ignored"),
  gsoIncludeUnmodified = (4, "include unmodified"),
  gsoExcludeSubmodules = (8, "exclude submodules"),
  gsoRecurseUntrackedDirs = (16, "recurse untracked dirs"),

  gsoRecurseIgnoredDirs = (64, "recurse ignored dirs"),
  gsoRenamesHeadToIndex = (128, "renames head to index"),
  gsoRenamesIndexToWorkdir = (256, "renames index to workdir"),
  gsoSortCaseSensitively = (512, "sort case sensitively"),
  gsoSortCaseInsensitively = (1024, "sort case insensitively"),
  gsoRenamesFromRewrites = (2048, "renames from rewrites"),
  gsoNoRefresh = (4096, "no refresh"), gsoUpdateIndex = (8192, "update index"),
  gsoIncludeUnreadable = (16384, "include unreadable")
GitStatusFlag = enum
  gsfCurrent = (0, "current"), gsfIndexNew = (1, "index new"),
  gsfIndexModified = (2, "index modified"), gsfIndexDeleted = (4, "index deleted"),
  gsfIndexRenamed = (8, "index renamed"),

  gsfTreeTypechange = (1024, "tree typechange"),
  gsfTreeRenamed = (2048, "tree renamed"), gsfIgnored = (16384, "ignored"),
  gsfConflicted = (32768, "conflicted")
GitCheckoutStrategy = enum
  gcsNone = (0, "dry run"), gcsSafe = (1, "safe"), gcsForce = (2, "force"),
  gcsRecreateMissing = (4, "recreate missing"),
  gcsAllowConflicts = (16, "allow conflicts"),
  gcsRemoveUntracked = (32, "remove untracked"),
  gcsRemoveIgnored = (64, "remove ignored"), gcsUpdateOnly = (128, "update only"),
  gcsDontUpdateIndex = (256, "don\'t update index"),
  gcsNoRefresh = (512, "no refresh"), gcsSkipUnmerged = (1024, "skip unmerged"),
  gcsUseOurs = (2048, "use ours"), gcsUseTheirs = (4096, "use theirs"),
  gcsDisablePathspecMatch = (8192, "disable pathspec match"),
  gcsUpdateSubmodules = (65536, "update submodules"),
  gcsUpdateSubmodulesIfChanged = (131072, "update submodules if changed"),
  gcsSkipLockedDirectories = (262144, "skip locked directories"),
  gcsDontOverwriteIgnored = (524288, "don\'t overwrite ignored"),
  gcsConflictStyleMerge = (1048576, "conflict style merge"),

  gcsDontRemoveExisting = (4194304, "don\'t remove existing"),
  gcsDontWriteIndex = (8388608, "don\'t write index")

  gcnUpdated = (4, "updated"), gcnUntracked = (8, "untracked"),
  gcnIgnored = (16, "ignored"), gcnAll = (65535, "all")
GitResultCode = enum
  grcApplyFail = (-35, "patch failed"), grcIndexDirty = (-34, "dirty index"),
  grcMismatch = (-33, "hash mismatch"), grcRetry = (-32, "retry"),
  grcIterOver = (-31, "end of iteration"), grcPassThrough = (-30, "pass-through"),

  gecNone = (0, "none"), gecNoMemory = (1, "no memory"), gecOS = (2, "os"),
  gecInvalid = (3, "invalid"), gecReference = (4, "reference"), gecZlib = (5, "zlib"),
  gecRepository = (6, "repository"), gecConfig = (7, "config"),
  gecRegEx = (8, "regex"), gecODB = (9, "odb"), gecIndex = (10, "index"),

  gecFilter = (24, "filter"), gecRevert = (25, "revert"),
  gecCallBack = (26, "call back"), gecCherryPick = (27, "cherry pick"),
  gecDescribe = (28, "describe"), gecReBase = (29, "re-base"),
  gecFileSystem = (30, "filesystem"), gecPatch = (31, "patch"),
  gecWorkTree = (32, "work tree"), gecSHA1 = (33, "sha1")
GitObjectKind = enum
  goAny = (0, "object"), goBad = (1, "invalid"), goCommit = (3, "commit"),
  goTree = (4, "tree"), goBlob = (5, "blob"), goTag = (6, "tag"), goOfsDelta = (8, "ofs"),
  goRefDelta = (9, "ref")
GitThing = ref object
  o*: GitObject
  case kind*: GitObjectKind
  of goTag:
      nil

  of goRefDelta:
      nil

  of goTree:
      nil

  else:
      nil

  
GitBuf = ptr git_buf
GitDiff = ptr git_diff

GitRevWalker = ptr git_revwalk
GitTreeEntry = ptr git_tree_entry

GitStatus = ptr git_status_entry
GitStatusList = ptr git_status_list
GitTree = ptr git_tree
GitClone = object
  url*: cstring
  directory*: cstring
  repo*: GitRepository
  options*: ptr git_clone_options

GitOpen = object
  path*: cstring
  repo*: GitRepository

GitTagTable = OrderedTableRef[string, GitThing]
